synopsis.text: Arurukan, a silver-haired woman, and Narumi, a Kung-Fu master with a peculiar illness, become the unlikely protectors of young Masaru Saiga, a fifth-grader with dreams of becoming a puppeteer. After inheriting 18 billion yen from his late father, the CEO of a giant home telephone maker, Masaru finds himself the target of nefarious schemes to steal his fortune. As wooden puppets with incredible strength pursue him, Narumi and Shirogane join forces to safeguard Masaru and unravel the dark conspiracies surrounding his inheritance. Together, they embark on a thrilling adventure filled with danger, laughter, and the ancient battle between humans and puppets in the heart-stopping world of Karakuri Circus.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
